description: The SPP5107C/17 Home Theater 10-Outlet Surge Protector is designed to protect your valuable home theater equipment and save energy doing it. The surge protector is divided into two energy-saving power zones, so you can choose which components you want to keep powered on and which ones you want to power down--a handy remote lets you control both zones from a distance. And because this surge protector has integrated RJ11 and coaxial connections, it also allows you to guard your home theater components from surges in your phone, DSL, and cable lines. Even if your home never experiences the type of event that causes instant damage, this surge protector can extend the life of your electronics by reducing the wear and tear caused by minor fluctuations in electrical current.Simplicity is. . .a Surge Protector thatprotectsyour HDTV andsaves energydoing it
title: Philips SPP5107C/17 10-Outlet Home Theater Surge Protector
